HELP:
[CMD_KEY]optouthere

Optout of BattleBanana on the guild you run the command.
This has the same effect as [CMD_KEY]optout but is local.
NOROLE:
There is no optout role on this guild!
Ask an admin to run ``[CMD_KEY]setuproles``
SUCCESS:
:ok_hand: You've opted out of BattleBanana on this guild!
You won't get exp, quests or be able to use commands here.
ALREADY:
You've already opted out on this sever!
Join the fun over here do ``[CMD_KEY]optinhere``
